remarks: The predicate "is a 1-dim subspace (atom)" (of a left module or left vector space).  (Contributed by NM, 9-Apr-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Jun-2014.)
statement:
lsatset.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lsatset.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) $.
lsatset.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) $.
lsatset.a $e |- A = ( LSAtoms ` W ) $.
islsat $p |- ( W e. X -> ( U e. A <-> E. x e. ( V \ { .0. } ) U = ( N ` { x } ) ) ) $.
$d .0. x $.
$d N x $.
$d U x $.
$d V x $.
$d W x $.
$d X x $.
